Small businesses form the backbone of our economy. The Fed & Treasury should do everything they can to help them stay afloat. Bailing out giant corporations & letting them gobble up struggling mom-and-pops to increase their market power does exactly the opposite.

Dr. Fauci is right. 

If we don't ramp up testing, if we don't get a national contact tracing program in place, and if we don't follow the social distancing guidelines, then the next wave of COVID-19 is going to cause even more unnecessary deaths. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EX6pHQuXsAAoI__.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1260630496469450753/vid/320x320/j3XnPC8Cj_HWI8v-.mp4?tag=13

I’m not sure what they were smoking, but whatever socialist euphoria they‘re feeling will fade fast when it arrives in the Senate.

I am also encouraged that we‘re not in this fight alone.

To be on a team w/@CathFlowers, @PramilaJayapal, @FlyingWithSara, @AbdulElSayed, @StephanieKelton, @VarshPrakash & others pushing for 21stc public policy means we are in this together.
